                   Premium helpdesk services for work
                  </a>
                 </li>
                 <li class="js_item lstchild">

                   Power cord replacement
                  </a>
                 </li>
                </ul>
               </li>
              </ul>
             </div>
            </div>
           </li>
          </ul>

                            Have Been Migrated to HP Support Forums

                             <div class="sub-nav-title-wrapper">
                              <span class="sub-nav-title">
                               <img alt="alert" src="/html/assets/comm_alert_icon.png" title="Community Alert"/>
                               Printing, Personal Computing and Mobile Boards
                               <br/>
                               Have Been Migrated to HP Support Forums
                              </span>
                              <span class="screenReading">
                               Open Menu
                              </span>
                             </div>
                             <div class="hp-nav-col">
                              We have completed the migration of all boards within the Printing and Digital Imaging, Desktops and Workstations, and Mobile categories to the HP Support Forums. Please
                              <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Announcements/Printing-Personal-Computing-and-Mobile-Boards-Migrating-to-HP/td-p/6750668" target='_"blank"' title="Read this post">
                               <font size="-1">
                                see this post for full details
                               </font>
                              </a>
                              on the migration, and how to get to your content.

                      <div class="board-title">
                       Grounded in the Cloud
                      </div>
                      <div class="board-description">
                       HP Helion brings together all the speed, agility and cost benefits of cloud computing, and with all the possibilities and interoperability of open source. Providing the cloud practitioner in you, the flexibility, reliability and security that enterprises need to move forward with confidence.
                       <br/>
                       <br/>
                       In this blog, we will explore the unique challenges and solutions of enterprise cloud deployment and usage. And in so doing, help you on your way to design, build and manage enterprise-grade infrastructure, platform and application services for the Cloud. Come join us now on this journey.
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="blog-articles lia-component-articles">
                      <div class="lia-message-view message-uid-6763075" id="messageview">
                       <div class="">
                        <div class="lia-js-resize-images lia-component-blogs-widget-blog-message-view">
                         <div data-message-id="6763075">
                          <div class="lia-panel-intermission">
                           <!-- container for custom hooks -->
                          </div>
                          <a name="M1364">
                          </a>
                          <a name="U6763075">
                          </a>
                          <div class="lia-inline-ajax-feedback">
                           <div class="AjaxFeedback" id="ajaxfeedback">
                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <div class="lia-message-unread lia-panel-message-root lia-message-blog lia-panel-message lia-js-data-messageUid-6763075">
                           <div class="lia-panel-message-content">
                            <div class="lia-decoration-border">
                             <div class="lia-decoration-border-top">
                              <div>
                              </div>
                             </div>
                             <div class="lia-decoration-border-content">
                              <div>
                               <div class="lia-quilt lia-quilt-blog-message lia-quilt-layout-blog-message">
                                <div class="lia-quilt-row lia-quilt-row-main">
                                 <div class="lia-quilt-column lia-quilt-column-24 lia-quilt-column-single lia-quilt-column-main">
                                  <div class="lia-quilt-column-alley lia-quilt-column-alley-single">
                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Creating-a-car-brand-out-of-the-cloud/ba-p/6763075">
                                       Creating a car brand  out of the cloud
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1613695">
                                        CloudStories
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       July 9, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Creating-a-car-brand-out-of-the-cloud/ba-p/6763075#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="right" alt="Luxgen image.jpg" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61764i5E94D7A1F63973AA/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="Luxgen image.jpg"/>
                                       Getting a new, mass market car brand up and running is not easy. The problem for new entrants is not the design and branding of a prototype. The difficulties lie in the ongoing sales, distribution, manufacture and support. In China, the worlds fastest growing new car market, Luxgen is making great strides in breaking into the mainstream.
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       Find out how The automation and orchestration capabilities of HP Helion CloudSystem help streamline and speed the provisioning of IT operations for this automotive company.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Creating-a-car-brand-out-of-the-cloud/ba-p/6763075">
                                        Read Blog Article
                                       </a>
                                      </div>

                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Cloud-Operating-Model-Transformation/ba-p/6762292">
                                       Cloud Operating Model Transformation
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">
                                        Stephen_Spector
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       July 9, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					- last edited July 7, 2015
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Cloud-Operating-Model-Transformation/ba-p/6762292#comment-on-this">

                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="Application_transformation_RGB_blue_NT_copy_tcm245_1923234_tcm245_1923235_tcm245-1923234.png" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61651iF18F45B36B015F1C/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="Application_transformation_RGB_blue_NT_copy_tcm245_1923234_tcm245_1923235_tcm245-1923234.png"/>
                                       Wiemer Kuik, IT Transformation Strategist, HP Helion discusses the cloud-centric IT operating model of the modern enterprise.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Cloud-Operating-Model-Transformation/ba-p/6762292">

                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Private-Cloud-adoption-forecasted-to-grow-to-85-percent-Recent/ba-p/6762303">
                                       Private Cloud adoption forecasted to grow to 85 percent. Recent report takes closer look
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">
                                        Stephen_Spector
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       July 8, 2015

                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="tbr-logo.png" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61655i3F457D775B78D2E1/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="tbr-logo.png"/>
                                       Ken Won, Director, Solutions Marketing, HP Helion highlights new information from a Technology Business Research report showing the rapid growth of the private cloud market. "
                                       <span>
                                        Private cloud adoption is the intersecting point between hybrid outcome-based adoption and public technology-focused adoption, and enterprises are beginning to more often favor self-built cloud offerings to provide higher IT control and more centralized purchasing."
                                       </span>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       <span>
                                        Keep reading to learn more about Ken's thoughts on the report.
                                       </span>
                                      </p>

                               <div class="lia-quilt lia-quilt-blog-message lia-quilt-layout-blog-message">
                                <div class="lia-quilt-row lia-quilt-row-main">
                                 <div class="lia-quilt-column lia-quilt-column-24 lia-quilt-column-single lia-quilt-column-main">
                                  <div class="lia-quilt-column-alley lia-quilt-column-alley-single">
                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/CIS-Group-helps-African-enterprises-deploy-forward-looking/ba-p/6763030">
                                       CIS Group helps African enterprises deploy forward-looking, affordable cloud solutions via HP Helion
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1613695">
                                        CloudStories
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       July 8, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/CIS-Group-helps-African-enterprises-deploy-forward-looking/ba-p/6763030#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="CIS logo.jpg" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61751iA7B7E7045FE559D6/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="CIS logo.jpg"/>
                                       Providing IT infrastructures for information and communications technology businesses as well as maintenance and related services in Africa, as CIS Group has done for more than thirty years, is a challenge unlike any in the world.
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       Keep reading to find out how HP Helion helped CIS Group provide cloud services to an economically challenged populace while also providing the industry with numerous job opportunities.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/CIS-Group-helps-African-enterprises-deploy-forward-looking/ba-p/6763030">
                                        Read Blog Article
                                       </a>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>

                              <div>
                               <div class="lia-quilt lia-quilt-blog-message lia-quilt-layout-blog-message">
                                <div class="lia-quilt-row lia-quilt-row-main">
                                 <div class="lia-quilt-column lia-quilt-column-24 lia-quilt-column-single lia-quilt-column-main">
                                  <div class="lia-quilt-column-alley lia-quilt-column-alley-single">
                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Podcast-You-are-the-change-agent-for-driving-cloud-adoption-in/ba-p/6762288">
                                       Podcast:  You (are) the change agent for driving cloud adoption in your business
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">
                                        Stephen_Spector
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       July 8, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					- last edited July 7, 2015
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Podcast-You-are-the-change-agent-for-driving-cloud-adoption-in/ba-p/6762288#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="HP_Discover2015_10813.jpg" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61673i5CED3AF36F7CCEBE/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="HP_Discover2015_10813.jpg"/>
                                       At the recent HP Discover event, we recorded several Discussion Forum sessions to release as podcasts. These sessions are small group talks where there are no slides allowing for the audience to engage directly with the speaker. This talk focuses on planning a cloud proof of concept to begin your cloud journey.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Podcast-You-are-the-change-agent-for-driving-cloud-adoption-in/ba-p/6762288">
                                        Read Blog Article
                                       </a>
                                      </div>

                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Check-out-what-s-new-with-HP-Cloud-Service-Automation/ba-p/6762639">
                                       Check out what's new with HP Cloud Service Automation!
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1362673">
                                        collinchau
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       July 7, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Check-out-what-s-new-with-HP-Cloud-Service-Automation/ba-p/6762639#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="new.jpg" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61683i148AA7145C2624F1/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="new.jpg"/>
                                       HP Cloud Service Automation (CSA) enables you to adapt to the new style of IT with enterprise class cloud services lifecycle management that gives you choice, consistency, and confidence.
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       Keep reading to learn more about the latest advancements we made to this release.
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>

                            <div class="lia-decoration-border">

                              <div>

                             <div class="lia-decoration-border-content">
                              <div>
                               <div class="lia-quilt lia-quilt-blog-message lia-quilt-layout-blog-message">
                                <div class="lia-quilt-row lia-quilt-row-main">
                                 <div class="lia-quilt-column lia-quilt-column-24 lia-quilt-column-single lia-quilt-column-main">
                                  <div class="lia-quilt-column-alley lia-quilt-column-alley-single">
                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Report-What-IT-managers-need-to-know-about-private-cloud/ba-p/6762298">
                                       Report: What IT managers need to know about private cloud
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">
                                        Stephen_Spector
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       July 7, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link-number" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Report-What-IT-managers-need-to-know-about-private-cloud/ba-p/6762298#comments">
                                         2 Comments
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="download.png" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61652iAF4227BAAC336B02/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="download.png"/>
                                       Forrester recently released a new report, "Top 10 Facts Every Tech Management Leader Should Know About Private Cloud" which is now available on the HP Helion site for you to download.
                                       <span>
                                        This report outlines the topten facts every tech management pro should know about private clouds to avoid over-investment, missed deadlines, and strategies that limit better engagement with your internal customers.
                                       </span>
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Report-What-IT-managers-need-to-know-about-private-cloud/ba-p/6762298">
                                        Read Blog Article
                                       </a>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>

                              <div>
                               <div class="lia-quilt lia-quilt-blog-message lia-quilt-layout-blog-message">
                                <div class="lia-quilt-row lia-quilt-row-main">
                                 <div class="lia-quilt-column lia-quilt-column-24 lia-quilt-column-single lia-quilt-column-main">
                                  <div class="lia-quilt-column-alley lia-quilt-column-alley-single">
                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Culture-shift-How-Sprint-manages-people-process-and-technology/ba-p/6757523">
                                       Culture shift: How Sprint manages people, process and technology to automate server provisioning
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1535226">
                                        NimishShelat
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       July 6, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					- last edited July 7, 2015
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Culture-shift-How-Sprint-manages-people-process-and-technology/ba-p/6757523#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="right" alt="OO Provisioning.png" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61316i21CD2645CAE156FA/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="OO Provisioning.png"/>
                                       Always striving to innovate, Sprint started to work in 2014 on system provisioning as a means to remove hands from the delivery chain. As Program Manager Chris Saunderson explains, theyve learned that removing human intervention not only makes things faster, but it also introduces a cultural shift that must be carefully managed.
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       <em>
                                        Part of an ongoing series of guest posts by HP Automation and Cloud Management customers.
                                       </em>
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">

                                       </a>
                                      </div>

                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/How-do-you-design-a-private-cloud-for-cloud-native-apps/ba-p/6756418">
                                       How do you design a private cloud for cloud native apps?
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">
                                        Stephen_Spector
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       July 2, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					- last edited June 19, 2015
-->
                                       <div class="comments">

                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="pit.png" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61247i783F9612A708842C/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="pit.png"/>
                                       Deborah Martin, HP Helion Solutions Marketing Manager provides information on a newly released guide for the enteprise, Designing Private Clouds for Cloud Native Apps Business Guide. Learn more about the purpose of this guide and where to download it in this blog.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/How-do-you-design-a-private-cloud-for-cloud-native-apps/ba-p/6756418">

                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">

                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">

                               <div class="lia-quilt lia-quilt-blog-message lia-quilt-layout-blog-message">
                                <div class="lia-quilt-row lia-quilt-row-main">
                                 <div class="lia-quilt-column lia-quilt-column-24 lia-quilt-column-single lia-quilt-column-main">
                                  <div class="lia-quilt-column-alley lia-quilt-column-alley-single">
                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Podcast-Scaling-web-applications-key-challenges-and-HP-best/ba-p/6756408">
                                       Podcast:  Scaling web applications: key challenges and HP best practices to address them
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">
                                        Stephen_Spector
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       July 1, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					- last edited June 19, 2015
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Podcast-Scaling-web-applications-key-challenges-and-HP-best/ba-p/6756408#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="HP_Discover2015_13189.jpg" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61244iEC90FEC5E500268E/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="HP_Discover2015_13189.jpg"/>
                                       At the recent HP Discover event, we recorded several Discussion Forum sessions to release as podcasts. These sessions are small group talks where there are no slides allowing for the audience to engage directly with the speaker. This podcast is from the Scaling web applications - key challenges and HP best practices to address them.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Podcast-Scaling-web-applications-key-challenges-and-HP-best/ba-p/6756408">
                                        Read Blog Article
                                       </a>
                                      </div>

                                         <li class="tag-17765 lia-tag-list-item">

                               <div class="lia-quilt lia-quilt-blog-message lia-quilt-layout-blog-message">
                                <div class="lia-quilt-row lia-quilt-row-main">
                                 <div class="lia-quilt-column lia-quilt-column-24 lia-quilt-column-single lia-quilt-column-main">

                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Accenture-and-HP-Private-Cloud-Solution-Session-at-HP-Discover/ba-p/6755888">
                                       Accenture and HP Private Cloud Solution Session at HP Discover
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">
                                        Stephen_Spector
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       June 30, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					- last edited June 19, 2015
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Accenture-and-HP-Private-Cloud-Solution-Session-at-HP-Discover/ba-p/6755888#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="Capture2.PNG" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61205iEF7C923680C2CA98/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="Capture2.PNG"/>
                                       At the recent HP Discover in Las Vegas, the HP Helion team hosted a variety of content for customers and partners to better understand our cloud vision and technology. This blog focuses on the joint talk with Accenture and HP Helion.
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       Included is the session video, slides, and highlights.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Accenture-and-HP-Private-Cloud-Solution-Session-at-HP-Discover/ba-p/6755888">

                                       </a>

-->

                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/How-Alestra-automated-cloud-services-provisioning-to-reduce/ba-p/6757497#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="right" alt="user request 1.png" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61311i8640769CC0671ECC/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="user request 1.png"/>
                                       In Mexicos highly competitive market of integrated IT-Telecom managed solutions for enterprises, Alestra needed to improve its time-to-market with new services, while reducing operational for provisioning. Alestra CIO Carlos Lerma Vzquez explains how Alestra used HP Hybrid Cloud Management solutions to bothas well as deliver a uniquely competitive service offering.
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       <em>
                                        Part of an ongoing series of guest posts by HP Automation and Cloud Management customers.
                                       </em>
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">

                            <div class="lia-decoration-border">
                             <div class="lia-decoration-border-top">
                              <div>

                             <div class="lia-decoration-border-content">
                              <div>
                               <div class="lia-quilt lia-quilt-blog-message lia-quilt-layout-blog-message">
                                <div class="lia-quilt-row lia-quilt-row-main">
                                 <div class="lia-quilt-column lia-quilt-column-24 lia-quilt-column-single lia-quilt-column-main">
                                  <div class="lia-quilt-column-alley lia-quilt-column-alley-single">
                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/CENACE-sees-what-s-truly-possible-in-the-cloud/ba-p/6758122">
                                       CENACE sees whats truly possiblein the cloud
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1613695">
                                        CloudStories
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       June 29, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/CENACE-sees-what-s-truly-possible-in-the-cloud/ba-p/6758122#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="Cenace Logo.png" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61344i20E24DFE933159D5/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="Cenace Logo.png"/>
                                       Cenance wanted to improve coordination and technical management of Ecuadors electrical National Interconnected System (NIS), including interconnections with Colombia. Its goal was to more effectively manage operational and information systems while expanding into new, more commercial service offerings through a new Network Operations Center (NOC).
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       Keep reading to find out how HP Helion CloudSystem Enterprise has helped.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/CENACE-sees-what-s-truly-possible-in-the-cloud/ba-p/6758122">
                                        Read Blog Article
                                       </a>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>

                                   </div>
                                   <div class="lia-message-actions-secondary lia-component-bookmarks">

                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Why-is-a-cloud-provider-like-a-restaurant/ba-p/6756679">
                                       Why is a cloud provider like a restaurant?
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">
                                        Stephen_Spector
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       June 29, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					- last edited June 19, 2015
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Why-is-a-cloud-provider-like-a-restaurant/ba-p/6756679#comment-on-this">

                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="HP_Discover2015_16496.jpg" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61261iBE89C4463EC02A05/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="HP_Discover2015_16496.jpg"/>
                                       Les Pall, Consutling Services, HP Helioncompares cloud providers to restaraunts to show the value of the HP Transform to Cloud workshops for your enterprise business.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Why-is-a-cloud-provider-like-a-restaurant/ba-p/6756679">

                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Stars-shining-bright-at-Prague-customer-forum/ba-p/6760019">
                                       Stars shining bright at Prague customer forum!
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1362673">
                                        collinchau
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       June 28, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Stars-shining-bright-at-Prague-customer-forum/ba-p/6760019#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="Prague.jpg" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61495i33F66CF0F4B7002F/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="Prague.jpg"/>
                                       Across two days in the beautiful city of Prague, around 70 likeminded individuals joined the HP Cloud &amp; Automation Management (CAM) Customer forum to hear from Customers and HP Partners about their experiences of using HP CAM solutions. Read on to find out more!
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       <em>
                                        <font size="2">

                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/You-can-have-it-all-Fast-to-market-plus-reliability-and-security/ba-p/6759157">
                                       You can have it all: Fast to market plus reliability and security
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">

                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/You-can-have-it-all-Fast-to-market-plus-reliability-and-security/ba-p/6759157#comment-on-this">

                                       Derek Howard, WW Service Provider Marketing Manager, HP Enterprise Group provides insight into finding the balance between getting new services to market first and doing it reliably and securely.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/You-can-have-it-all-Fast-to-market-plus-reliability-and-security/ba-p/6759157">

                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Implementing-DevOps-in-the-Enterprise/ba-p/6756323">
                                       Implementing DevOps in the Enterprise
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">
                                        Stephen_Spector
                                       </a>

                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="176829387.jpg" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61234iB6996330F6C30580/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="176829387.jpg"/>
                                       Bert van Rij, IT Strategist, HP Helion provides details into the definition of DevOps and the implications of implementing within an enterprise.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Implementing-DevOps-in-the-Enterprise/ba-p/6756323">

                              <div>
                               <div class="lia-quilt lia-quilt-blog-message lia-quilt-layout-blog-message">
                                <div class="lia-quilt-row lia-quilt-row-main">
                                 <div class="lia-quilt-column lia-quilt-column-24 lia-quilt-column-single lia-quilt-column-main">

                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Podcast-Making-DevOps-a-Reality-with-PaaS/ba-p/6756339">
                                       Podcast: Making DevOps a Reality with PaaS
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">
                                        Stephen_Spector
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       June 24, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					- last edited June 19, 2015
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Podcast-Making-DevOps-a-Reality-with-PaaS/ba-p/6756339#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="HP_Discover2015_20326.jpg" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61236iA49E1232EAF845B3/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="HP_Discover2015_20326.jpg"/>
                                       At the recent HP Discover event, we recorded several Discussion Forum sessions to release as podcasts. These sessions are small group talks where there are no slides allowing for the audience to engage directly with the speaker. This podcast is from the Making DevOps a reality wtih PaaS talk from Sam Gazitt, Group Product Manager, HP Helion.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Podcast-Making-DevOps-a-Reality-with-PaaS/ba-p/6756339">
                                        Read Blog Article
                                       </a>

                                 <div class="lia-quilt-column lia-quilt-column-24 lia-quilt-column-single lia-quilt-column-main">

                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Big-ideas-about-cloud-from-a-small-nation/ba-p/6758058">
                                       Big ideas  about cloud from a small nation
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1613695">
                                        CloudStories
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       June 23, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Big-ideas-about-cloud-from-a-small-nation/ba-p/6758058#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="Forestals.png" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61338i7BF2073F95E20AED/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="Forestals.png"/>
                                       Forestals Group in Malta was looking to update an aging infrastructure and begin the journey to a cloud computing environment.
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       Keep reading to find out how HP Helion provides the cloud infrastructure to transform both Forestals business and its customers.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Big-ideas-about-cloud-from-a-small-nation/ba-p/6758058">
                                        Read Blog Article
                                       </a>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>

                               <div class="lia-quilt lia-quilt-blog-message lia-quilt-layout-blog-message">
                                <div class="lia-quilt-row lia-quilt-row-main">
                                 <div class="lia-quilt-column lia-quilt-column-24 lia-quilt-column-single lia-quilt-column-main">
                                  <div class="lia-quilt-column-alley lia-quilt-column-alley-single">
                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/PCP-Partner-delivers-services-on-demand-with-flexible-pay-as-you/ba-p/6758030">
                                       PCP Partner delivers services on demand with flexible pay-as-you-go cloud
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1613695">
                                        CloudStories
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       June 23, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/PCP-Partner-delivers-services-on-demand-with-flexible-pay-as-you/ba-p/6758030#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="PCP Partner logo.jpg" border="0" height="98" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61334i81BCF54C40F1E3D3/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="PCP Partner logo.jpg" width="200"/>
                                       PCP Partner Oy was struggling with capacity shortfalls and the impact it had on customers and the business.
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       Keep reading to find out how HP Operations Orchestration tools helped automate much of its service offering and HP Flexible Capacity helped remedy capacity issues.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/PCP-Partner-delivers-services-on-demand-with-flexible-pay-as-you/ba-p/6758030">
                                        Read Blog Article
                                       </a>
                                      </div>

                                     </a>
                                    </div>

                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Cloud-Foundry-Avoiding-Vendor-Lock-In/ba-p/6754633">
                                       Cloud Foundry: Avoiding Vendor Lock-In
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">
                                        Stephen_Spector
                                       </a>

                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="P1160039.JPG" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61258i22A1700CDC171266/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="P1160039.JPG"/>
                                       RickEvans, Senior Evangelist Technologist, HP Helion presents the case on how building applications in a Cloud Foundry environment prevents vendor lock-in.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">

                               <div class="lia-quilt lia-quilt-blog-message lia-quilt-layout-blog-message">
                                <div class="lia-quilt-row lia-quilt-row-main">
                                 <div class="lia-quilt-column lia-quilt-column-24 lia-quilt-column-single lia-quilt-column-main">
                                  <div class="lia-quilt-column-alley lia-quilt-column-alley-single">
                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/How-Soci%C3%A9t%C3%A9-G%C3%A9n%C3%A9rale-used-automation-to-improve-application/ba-p/6757451">
                                       How Socit Gnrale used automation to improve application deployment time and quality
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1535226">
                                        NimishShelat
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       June 22, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					- last edited June 29, 2015
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/How-Soci%C3%A9t%C3%A9-G%C3%A9n%C3%A9rale-used-automation-to-improve-application/ba-p/6757451#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="right" alt="CSA Platform.png" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61308iCE3FE35A7CBD49C3/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="CSA Platform.png"/>
                                       Is your deployment process easily repeatable? With more than 500 applications in production, French financial giant Socit Gnrale (Socgen) needed to reduce the time it took to deploy these applications. Here is an inside look at how theyve used automation and orchestration to implement a nearly perfect deployment process.
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       <em>
                                        Part of an ongoing series of guest posts by HP Automation and Cloud Management customers.
                                       </em>
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/How-Soci%C3%A9t%C3%A9-G%C3%A9n%C3%A9rale-used-automation-to-improve-application/ba-p/6757451">
                                        Read Blog Article
                                       </a>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>

                               <div class="lia-quilt lia-quilt-blog-message lia-quilt-layout-blog-message">
                                <div class="lia-quilt-row lia-quilt-row-main">
                                 <div class="lia-quilt-column lia-quilt-column-24 lia-quilt-column-single lia-quilt-column-main">

                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/A-Technical-Deep-Dive-into-HP-Helion-CloudSystem-9-0/ba-p/6755880">
                                       A Technical Deep Dive into HP Helion CloudSystem 9.0
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">
                                        Stephen_Spector
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       June 22, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					- last edited June 19, 2015
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/A-Technical-Deep-Dive-into-HP-Helion-CloudSystem-9-0/ba-p/6755880#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="hphelion cloudsystem.jpg" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61200i868D454660264564/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="hphelion cloudsystem.jpg"/>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       At the recent HP Discover in Las Vegas, the HP Helion team hosted a variety of content for customers and partners to better understand our cloud vision and technology. This blog focuses on our HP Helion CloudSystem 9.0 announcement made at the event.
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       Included is the sesion video, slides and highlights.
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/A-Technical-Deep-Dive-into-HP-Helion-CloudSystem-9-0/ba-p/6755880">
                                        Read Blog Article
                                       </a>

                                  <div class="lia-quilt-column-alley lia-quilt-column-alley-single">
                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Why-Containers-are-an-essential-component-of-the-Cloud-journey/ba-p/6757010">
                                       Why Containers are an essential component of the Cloud journey
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">
                                        Stephen_Spector
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       June 22, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Why-Containers-are-an-essential-component-of-the-Cloud-journey/ba-p/6757010#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="HP_Discover2015_16502.jpg" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61287i69F9D435ADBCA3A8/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="HP_Discover2015_16502.jpg"/>
                                       Omri Gazitt, VP Engineering, HP Helion provides background on the newly announced Open Container Project under the Linux Foundation. The goal of the project is to develop open standards for containers, specifically for interoperable container image formats.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Why-Containers-are-an-essential-component-of-the-Cloud-journey/ba-p/6757010">
                                        Read Blog Article
                                       </a>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="categories">
                                      Tags:
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/tag/containers/tg-p">
                                       containers
                                      </a>
                                      |
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/tag/Docker/tg-p">
                                       Docker
                                      </a>
