                       <div class="">
                        <div class="lia-js-resize-images lia-component-blogs-widget-blog-message-view">
                         <div data-message-id="6756346">
                          <div class="lia-panel-intermission">
                           <!-- container for custom hooks -->
                          </div>
                          <a name="M1335">
                          </a>
                          <a name="U6756346">
                          </a>
                          <div class="lia-inline-ajax-feedback">
                           <div class="AjaxFeedback" id="ajaxfeedback_24">
                           </div>
                          </div>
                          <div class="lia-message-unread lia-panel-message-root lia-message-blog lia-panel-message lia-js-data-messageUid-6756346">
                           <div class="lia-panel-message-content">
                            <div class="lia-decoration-border">
                             <div class="lia-decoration-border-top">
                              <div>
                              </div>
                             </div>
                             <div class="lia-decoration-border-content">
                              <div>
                               <div class="lia-quilt lia-quilt-blog-message lia-quilt-layout-blog-message">
                                <div class="lia-quilt-row lia-quilt-row-main">
                                 <div class="lia-quilt-column lia-quilt-column-24 lia-quilt-column-single lia-quilt-column-main">
                                  <div class="lia-quilt-column-alley lia-quilt-column-alley-single">
                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Service-providers-Fuel-for-your-business-growth/ba-p/6756346">
                                       Service providers: Fuel for your business growth
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1606921">
                                        Ops_Guest
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       June 18, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Service-providers-Fuel-for-your-business-growth/ba-p/6756346#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="Differentiation is everything.png" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61235i4DE45F924196CD51/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="Differentiation is everything.png"/>
                                       As a service provider, you have to be ready to move fast when customers look to you for the latest and greatest services. If that means you need to upgrade to new technology to do it, you better be prepared to move fast there, too. Your business growth depends on it  because if you cant deliver, your customers are going to find someone else who can.
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       But keeping up isnt easy. Keep reading to find out how you can keep up.
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       Guest post by Derek Howard, Worldwide Service Provider Marketing Manager, HP Enterprise Group
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Service-providers-Fuel-for-your-business-growth/ba-p/6756346">
                                        Read Blog Article
                                       </a>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="categories">
                                      Tags:

                                       Derek Howard
                                      </a>
                                      |
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/tag/Service%20Providers/tg-p">
                                       Service Providers
                                      </a>
                                     </div>

                                       HP cloud

                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/OpenStack-is-Ready-Are-You-Forrester-Report-Released/ba-p/6755194">
                                       OpenStack is Ready  Are You? Forrester Report Released
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">
                                        Stephen_Spector
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       June 18, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/OpenStack-is-Ready-Are-You-Forrester-Report-Released/ba-p/6755194#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04
-->
                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="image.PNG" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61138iD57F2F6EE8104564/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="image.PNG"/>
                                       The OpenStack community has just released a new Forrester Report written by Lauren E. Nelson concerning the viability of the technology and feedback directly from users such as BMW, Disney, and Wal-Mart.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/OpenStack-is-Ready-Are-You-Forrester-Report-Released/ba-p/6755194">

                                       </a>
                                      </div>

                                   <div class="lia-message-container custom-article">
                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Podcast-Cloud-Security-for-HP-Helion-from-Catbird/ba-p/6755532">
                                       Podcast: Cloud Security for HP Helion from Catbird
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">
                                        Stephen_Spector
                                       </a>
                                       <span class="byline-separator">
                                        |
                                       </span>
                                       June 17, 2015
                                       <!-- Suppress "last edited" date :: Warren Brill on 2015-06-29
					
-->
                                       <div class="comments">
                                        <a class="comments-link" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Podcast-Cloud-Security-for-HP-Helion-from-Catbird/ba-p/6755532#comment-on-this">
                                         Post a Comment
                                        </a>
                                        <!-- Bypassed first iteration of Kudos button group on BlogArticle Page :: Warren Brill on 2015-02-04

                                       </div>
                                      </div>
                                     </div>
                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="Bart Vansevenant Picture.JPG" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61167i7FD6CBD3E00674E2/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="Bart Vansevenant Picture.JPG"/>
                                       In this weeks podcast, Bobby Patrick, CMO HP Helion speaks with Bart Vansevenant, CMO Catbird about the recently announced partnership for cloud security from Catbird in HP Helion technology.
                                      </p>
                                      <div class="teaser-read-more">
                                       <a class="read-more" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Podcast-Cloud-Security-for-HP-Helion-from-Catbird/ba-p/6755532">
                                        Read Blog Article
                                       </a>

                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/The-Rise-of-the-cloud-service-broker-function/ba-p/6754602">
                                       The Rise of the cloud service broker function
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">

                                       <div class="comments">

                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="wiernerkuik.jpg" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61163i12C278253E027E9B/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="wiernerkuik.jpg"/>
                                       Wiemer Kuik, IT Transformation Strategist, HP Helion provides insight into the cloud service broker function in the enterprise.
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                      </p>
                                      <p>
                                       Keep reading to learn about his insights.
                                      </p>

                                    <div class="lia-message-heading">
                                     <h1 class="lia-message-subject">
                                      <a href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/Grounded-in-the-Cloud/Bill-Hilf-talks-with-The-New-Stack-and-RedMonk-at-HP-Discover/ba-p/6754611">
                                       Bill Hilf talks with The New Stack and RedMonk at HP Discover
                                      </a>
                                     </h1>
                                     <div class="article-meta-info">
                                      <div class="byline">
                                       <a class="blog-author" href="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1459267">
                                        Stephen_Spector
                                       </a>

                                     <div class="lia-message-body">
                                      <p>
                                       <img align="left" alt="Capture.PNG" border="0" src="http://h30499.www3.hp.com/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/61109i30D9E91B19CCB0DC/image-size/small?v=mpbl-1&amp;px=-1" title="Capture.PNG"/>
                                       Bill Hilf, SVP Product Management, HP Helion recorded a podcast wtih Alex Williams, The New Stack, Stephen O'Grady, RedMonk and James Governor, Red Monk at the recent HP Disover event. This post includes links to the podcast as well as Alex's blog post on this interview.
                                      </p>

                                        <div class="lia-view-all">
                                         <a class="lia-link-navigation view-all-link" href="/t5/forums/tagdetailpage/tag-cloud-grouping/tag/tag-cloud-style/frequent/message-scope/single/message-uid/6754611/user-scope/all/tag-scope/all/timerange/all/tag-visibility-scope/all" id="link_310" rel="tag">
                                          View All (7)
                                         </a>

                          <div class="lia-panel-heading-bar">
                           <span class="lia-panel-heading-bar-title">
                            About the Author(s)

                         <div class="lia-panel-content-wrapper">
                          <div class="lia-panel-content">
                           <div class="BlogBiosTaplet" id="blogbiostaplet">
                            <div class="blog-bio">
                             <ul class="lia-list-standard" id="list_89">
                              <li>
                               <div class="UserProfileSummary lia-user-item lia-js-data-userId-609042 lia-user-info-group">
                                <div class="UserAvatar lia-user-avatar lia-component-common-widget-user-avatar">
                                 <a class="UserAvatar lia-link-navigation" href="/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/609042" id="link_318" tabindex="-1" target="_self">
                                  <img alt="ArchieReed" class="lia-user-avatar-message" id="display_29" src="/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/14253i8CB46000D67228B8/image-dimensions/128x72?v=mpbl-1" title="ArchieReed"/>
                                 </a>
                                </div>
                                <div class="lia-user-attributes">
                                 <div class="lia-user-name">
                                  <span class="UserName lia-user-name">
                                   <a class="lia-link-navigation lia-page-link lia-user-name-link" href="/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/609042" id="link_319" style="color:#007DBA" target="_self">
                                    <span class="">
                                     ArchieReed
                                    </span>
                                   </a>
                                  </span>
                                 </div>
                                 <div class="lia-user-title">
                                  Chief Technologist - Strategic Enterprise Services
                                 </div>
                                </div>
                               </div>
                              </li>
                              <li class="blog-bio-blurb">
                               Archie delivers strategic solutions focused on todays critical and evolving business needs, linked to the growing list of Strategic Enterprise Services including Hybrid Cloud, IM&amp;A including Social Media, Security and Mobility from BYOD to mobile applicatio
                               <wbr>
                               </wbr>
                               ns.

Archie is the author of 4 books so far, and a founding director of the Australian Cloud Security Alliance chapter.
                              </li>
                              <li>
                               <div class="UserProfileSummary lia-user-item lia-js-data-userId-1806 lia-user-info-group">
                                <div class="UserAvatar lia-user-avatar lia-component-common-widget-user-avatar">
                                 <a class="UserAvatar lia-link-navigation" href="/t5/user/viewprofilepage/user-id/1806" id="link_320" tabindex="-1" target="_self">
                                  <img alt="Chris Purcell" class="lia-user-avatar-message" id="display_30" src="/t5/image/serverpage/image-id/805i539514597EC6BDB3/image-dimensions/128x72?v=mpbl-1" title="Chris Purcell"/>
                                 </a>
                                </div>
                                <div class="lia-user-attributes">
                                 <div class="lia-user-name">

                              <li class="blog-bio-blurb">
                               Nimish Shelat is currently focused on Datacenter Automation and IT Process Automation solutions. Shelat strives to help customers, traditiona
                               <wbr>
                               </wbr>
                               l IT and Cloud based IT,  transform to Service Centric model.
The scope of these solutions spans across server, database and middleware infrastruc
                               <wbr>
                               </wbr>
                               ture. The solutions  are optimized for tasks like provisioni
                               <wbr>
                               </wbr>
                               ng, patching, compliance
                               <wbr>
                               </wbr>
                               , remediatio
                               <wbr>
                               </wbr>
                               n and processes like  Self-heali
                               <wbr>
                               </wbr>
                               ng Incidence Remediatio
                               <wbr>
                               </wbr>
                               n and Rapid Service Fulfilment
                               <wbr>
                               </wbr>
                               , Change Management and Disaster Recovery. 

Shelat has 21 years of experience in IT, 18 of these have been at HP spanning across networking
                               <wbr>
                               </wbr>
                               , printing , storage and enterprise software businesses
                               <wbr>
                               </wbr>
                               . Prior to his current role as a World-Wide Product Marketing Manager, Shelat has held positions as Software Sales Specialist
                               <wbr>
                               </wbr>
                               , Product Manager, Business Strategist
                               <wbr>
                               </wbr>
                               , Project Manager and Programmer Analyst.

Shelat has a B.S in Computer Science. He has earned his MBA from University of California
                               <wbr>
                               </wbr>
                               , Davis with a focus on Marketing and Finance.

                           <!-- 
&lt;script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-latest.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
-->
                           <script>
                            function activate_dd(dd)
{
	dd.css('visibility','visible');
	dd.focus();
	dd.live('mouseleave', function () { dd.css('visibility','hidden'); });
}


function init_dd(dd,a)
{
	//a.click(function() { activate_dd(dd); return false; });
	a.hover(function() { activate_dd(dd); return false; });
}

function gotoURL()
{
	var s = $(this);
	var url = s.find("option:selected").attr("value")

	window.open(url);
}

$(document).ready(
	function()
	{
		var zhack = 0; 
		$('.tnb_followus_box').each(function(i){
			if ( $(this).find('ul.dropdown').length ) {
				//$(this).append('&lt;div class="arrow" /&gt;').find('div.arrow').show();
				//$(this).css('zIndex', zhack);
				zhack--;
			}
		});

		/*
		$('.tnb_followus_box a').hover(
		function(){
			$(this).siblings('ul').toggle();
		},
		function(){
			$(this).siblings('ul').toggle();
		});*/

		init_dd($("#dd1") ,$("#a1"));
		init_dd($("#dd2") ,$("#a2"));
		init_dd($("#dd3") ,$("#a3"));
		init_dd($("#dd4") ,$("#a4"));
		$(".dd").click(gotoURL)
		$(".dd").css('visibility','hidden');
		
		$('.logos .tnb_followus_box:last').css('margin-right', 0);
	}
)
                           </script>
                           <!--[if IE 6]&gt;
&lt;script&gt;

$(document).ready(
	function()
	{
		$('.tnb_followus li.tnb_followus_box').hover(function(){
			$(this).addClass('hover');
		},function(){
			$(this).removeClass('hover');
		});
	}
)

&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;![endif]-->

                            </ul>

;(function() {
	jQuery(document).ready(function() {
		// Slide
		jQuery("#custom-links-menu &gt; li &gt; a.expanded + ul").slideToggle("medium");
		jQuery("#custom-links-menu &gt; li &gt; a").click(function() {
			jQuery(this).toggleClass("expanded").toggleClass("collapsed").parent().find('&gt; ul').slideToggle("medium");
		});
	});	

})();

      <script type="text/javascript">
       (function($) {
		var searchText = "Search HP Forum";
		
		$("#lia-body .lia-content .lia-component-common-widget-search-form .lia-form-type-text").focus(function(event) {
			if ($.trim($(this).val()) == searchText) {
				$(this).val("");
			}
		}).blur(function(event) {
			if ($.trim($(this).val()) == "") {
				$(this).val(searchText);
			}
		}).val(searchText);
	})(LITHIUM.jQuery);
      </script>
     </div>
